mapper.select: SELECT notice_Idx AS noticeIdx, notice_Title AS noticeTitle, notice_Sub As noticeSub, notice_Date AS noticeDate FROM NOTICE_TABLE ORDER BY notice_Date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_TABLE (NOTICE_IDX, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_SUB, USER_IDX, NOTICE_DATE) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeSub}, #{userIdx}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE_TABLE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_SUB = #{noticeSub}, NOTICE_MODIFY = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_IDX = #{noticeIdx}
